title: Employees for riot
body: I think most of them are dumb and uneducated. Never get jobs done and punish innocent people for nothing. They are hopeless and do not deserve to get paid. Sure you guys feed and troll in game hard and screw someones day. You noobs , learn to service customers and stop being a jerk. Wish I am manager and get rid of them asap in oce server.{{sticker:draven-pose}}

replies.body:
Rule Violated: Don't Be a Jerk
so it's ok for this guy to be a jerk

They just built the worlds most popular online game from scratch, and filled it with over 150 unique and interesting characters all with different play styles and skins, champs that mesh almost perfectly together to create a quite well balanced environment for the millions and millions of players that use it every single day of the year.

Man.... if only I didn't go to school... now I'm educated and cant do any of that... damn. :(

Rule Violated: Don't Be a Jerk
so being smug to someones feedback isn't being a jerk

From scratch?????????? How many people actually get to design champs?????? 150 'unique' champions and play style????????  Lmfao. How many champs are get to be used during a certain patch in comeptition?????? Millions people play this game everyday for several hours, but it is not necesaarily becuz game is gud. [REMOVED]

Rule Violated: Don't Be a Jerk
So making someone feel small isn't a Violation
You guy's don't know what constructive feed back is... Bullying a customer isn't the right approach. Do you want me to teach you. I study business so i could teach you a thing or two.
